mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: FreshBoard connects customers with local farmers and vendors across Norway, making it easy to find fresh, locally-sourced produce at fair prices. We believe in transparency, supporting local businesses, and bringing the freshest products to your table.

step1.title: Browse Products
step1.description: Explore our catalog of fresh produce from local vendors. Filter by category, location, and price to find exactly what you need.

step2.title: Check Prices & Availability
step2.description: All prices are updated daily by our vendors, ensuring you always see the most current information and availability.

step3.title: Contact Vendors Directly
step3.description: Found something you like? Contact the vendor directly via WhatsApp to place your order or ask questions.

freshLocal.title: Fresh & Local:
freshLocal.description: All products come directly from Norwegian farms and local vendors

transparentPricing.title: Transparent Pricing:
transparentPricing.description: See exactly what you're paying with daily updated prices

supportLocal.title: Support Local:
supportLocal.description: Every purchase supports local farmers and small businesses

easyCommunication.title: Easy Communication:
easyCommunication.description: Direct contact with vendors for personalized service

noMiddleman.title: No Middleman:
noMiddleman.description: Connect directly with producers for the best prices

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Whether you're a customer looking for fresh produce or a vendor wanting to reach more customers, FreshBoard is here to help. Together, we're building a more sustainable and connected food system in Norway.
